careers.title: Instrumentation Technician
careers.description: Maintains sensors and communication devices for remote data transmission.

careers.title: Farm Technology Assistant
careers.description: Helps install and monitor weather systems and irrigation based on forecasts.

careers.title: Science Filmmaker / Documentary Producer
careers.description: Creates educational films that explain science concepts and real-world issues through visual storytelling.

careers.title: Educational Technologist
careers.description: Designs learning experiences that use video and interactive media to teach science.

careers.title: Sound & Video Engineer
careers.description: Manages audio and camera systems for filming scientific content in the field.

careers.title: Science Journalist / Narrator
careers.description: Researches and writes scripts for science documentaries and public broadcasts.

careers.title: Camera Operator / Drone Pilot
careers.description: Captures aerial and close-up footage of farm operations and natural processes.

careers.title: Video Editor / Post-Production Assistant
careers.description: Cuts, edits, and adds sound or captions to science documentaries.

careers.title: Lighting & Sound Technician
careers.description: Sets up microphones, lighting rigs, and power safely for outdoor shoots.

careers.title: Storyboard Artist / Animator
careers.description: Creates visual storyboards and simple animations to explain science ideas.
